appUpdate.question: A new version is available. Required files will be downloaded which may take a moment. Page reload will follow when update is done. Would you like to update now?
appUpdate.title: New app version available

aboutMe.subtitle: It doesn't take much to make clean and elegant web solutions

freelancer.p1: Have you heard about Progressive Web Apps? It's the standard for next generation hybrid apps that imitates the native mobile apps behavior without the need of downloading the app from the app store.
freelancer.p2: The PWA features basic offline capability and cross-platform compatibility. I have decent experience creating Progressive Web Apps using the cutting edge technologies like Angular framework, Angular Material, Firebase and RxJS. Feel free to contact me with any question and I will create the app your company needs.
